description: Positions of permutations produced by the transposition sequence A057112 in A055089.
maple: atp_perm_ranks := proc(upto_n) local t,a,p,i,k; p := convert([1],'disjcyc'); k := nops(factorial_base(upto_n))+1; a := []; for i from 1 to upto_n do a := [op(a),PermRevLexRank(convert(p,'permlist',k))]; t := adj_tp_seq(i); p := mulperms([[t,t+1]],p); od; RETURN(a); end;
author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 09 2000
